thread.section_title: Travel SOS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travel SOS | travelsos.co.uk
thread.title: Danielle Shipway
thread.title_full: Travel SOS reviewed by Danielle Shipway

author: Danielle Shipway
title: Danielle Shipway
text:
I UsedTtravel SOS for a staff social event, it was easy thanks to Usman.
22 People from Birmingham City centre to Stratford Upon Avon, we had two vehicles (a mini bus and a people carrier) both vehicles were clean and the drivers really friendly.
They arrived on time and called me to let me know they were outside.
They then picked up 18 people from Stratford and brought them back to the city centre, again on time with great communication!
We have now set up and account with Travel SOS. I would highly recommend this company! Great overall service.
Thanks Guys!
